name: resume-automator
description: Git-backed LaTeX resume management desktop app
author: Arnav Purushotam

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace backend && npm run build --workspace frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace backend && npm run typecheck --workspace frontend
scripts.desktop:dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "wait-on tcp:4100 http://127.0.0.1:5173 && ELECTRON_START_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 electron desktop/main.cjs"
scripts.desktop:dir: npm run build && electron-builder --mac dir --publish never
